heading: Unsorted worries
subheading: Click on a worry that you want to focus on in worry time.
paragraphs: Use your worry time effectively by focusing on worries that you can solve or that are causing you the most distress.
Prioritize the ones that you can do something about right now, the ones that are most important to you, and the ones that will provide the greatest relief when resolved (Oooh, what a feeling!).
